data.eml:eml: On the spider genus Neonella (Araneae: Salticidae): new records and taxonomic notes for species from southern South America

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ott, Ricardo, Silva, Guilherme O., Marta, Kimberly S., Rodrigues, Everton N. L. (2015): On the spider genus Neonella (Araneae: Salticidae): new records and taxonomic notes for species from southern South America. Zootaxa 3946 (4): 583-586, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3946.4.7
